医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
长子的早期逆境增加了兄弟姐妹的心理健康风险如果在最初的1,000天内经历了一项新的研究，则儿童在五至18岁之间发展心理健康问题的可能性将近四分之三（71％）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/early-earlly-eardersity-in-firstborns-increases-increases-mental-health-health-risk-for-siblings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/early-earlly-aververity-in-firstborns-increases-increases-mental-health-health-risk-for-siblings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cc94340-9d51-47fa-aaf9-9ce1a4af0a38 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 23:00:43 -0500 Early adversity in firstborns increases mental health risk for siblings
创新的3D血脑屏障模型增强了对神经炎症的理解一个3D模型准确地模仿了实验室环境中的血脑屏障（BBB）（BBB），由由机械工程学，生命科学，IT融合工程和融合研究生院的Jinah Jang教授领导的研究团队成功地开发了Postech和首尔国立大学医院神经外科系的Sun Ha Paek教授。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/innovative-3d-blood-brain-brain-brain-barrier-model-enhances-enhances-undercanding-neuroinflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/innovative-3d-blood-brain-brain-brain-barrier-model-enhances-underding--neuroinflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c00e416f-f199-4AA1-A1-A8D5-DB2FE2FE2DFF088 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 22:54:45 -0500 Innovative 3D blood-brain barrier model enhances understanding of neuroinflammation
新的显微镜技术提供了负担得起的研究癌细胞代谢的方法了解肿瘤如何改变其新陈代谢以抵抗治疗是癌症研究的焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-microscophy-technique-niqeers-niqeers-frordable-way-way-way-candy-cancer-cancer-cell-cell-cell-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-microscophy-technique-crenders-forder-affordable-way-way-to-to-to-to-cancer-cancer-cell-cell-cell-cell-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2b7700b-0127-46E9-91C9-91C9-235AD27D4615 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 22:47:38 -0500 New microscopy technique offers affordable way to study cancer cell metabolism
USC获得了600万美元的开拓性胶质母细胞瘤基因疗法的赠款加利福尼亚再生医学研究所已向USC调查人员授予了600万美元的赠款，开创了一种新的胶质母细胞瘤基因疗法，这是一种严重的脑癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/USC-Receives-246.66亿格兰特 - for-pioneering-pioneering-glioblastoma-gene-gene-gene-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/USC-Receives-246.66亿格兰特 - for-for-pioneering-glioblastoma-gene-gene-gene-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AED19A8D-C636-469A-8A86-FAEFFBCB8EF2 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 22:43:53 -0500 USC receives $6 million grant for pioneering glioblastoma gene therapy
空气污染与增加呼吸道感染的住院治疗有关空气污染是呼吸道疾病（例如哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD））的众所周知的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/air-pollution-link-to-incred-to increased-hospital-admissions-for-respiratory-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/Air-pollution-link-to-to-incred-hospital-admissions-for-respiratory-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a3c700d-8955-42f1-be7a-eDfa444444f63523 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 22:35:35 -0500 Air pollution linked to increased hospital admissions for respiratory infections
研究表明，东亚人的铁超载风险更大。新康奈尔大学的研究表明，与北欧血统相比，东亚血统的个人患铁储存的风险更高，这使他们的慢性病风险更高，例如心脏病，2型糖尿病，肝病和癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/east-asians-have-greater-rest-risk-for-risk-risk-risk-iron-overload-rasearch-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/east-asians-have-greater-rist-risk-for-risk-for-iron-overload-rasearch-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db965be0-fec8-411d-a7e2-9A924D34C211 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 22:02:01 -0500 East Asians have greater risk for iron overload, research shows
达特茅斯的研究链接缺少出生支持到更高的压力水平包括其他灵长类动物在内的大多数动物单独生育，但是由于该过程的生理复杂性，人类在分娩时需要援助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/dartmouth-study-links-missing-birth-subirth-support to-higher to-Higher to-to-to-Higher surster-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/dartmouth-study-links-missing-birth-support-support to-higher to-higher to-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce5da11c-5066-4B9A-828A-828A-3FA61354EC5B Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:56:33 -0500 Dartmouth study links missing birth support to higher stress levels
高精度辐射疗法发现对多聚癌症是安全的伦敦健康科学中心研究所（LHSCRI）的一项新期临床试验发现，高精度放射疗法可安全用于癌症患者，该癌症已扩散到体内10个以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/high-precision-radiation-therapy-therapy-found-to-be-saf-saf--for-for-polymetastastic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/high-precision-radiation-therapy-therapy-found-to-be-be-saf-saf--for-polymetastastic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dbb8Def-51CE-43DE-BF9F-BF9F-B539617DE07C Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:52:23 -0500 High-precision radiation therapy found to be safe for polymetastatic cancer

研究解锁了与心脏病有关的APOB100蛋白质的结构秘密低密度脂蛋白（LDL）（通常称为不良胆固醇）长期以来一直是科学家的雷达，作为心脏病的主要贡献者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-unlocks-structural-screntural-screntural-screturs-opbob100-protein-protein-protein-protein-to-to-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-unlocks-structural-screntural-screntural-screturs-opbob100-protein-protein-protein-protein-proteed to-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=355a65a2-b940-4f940-4f95-a053-4c64d9218e83 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 21:40:28 -0500 Study unlocks structural secrets of ApoB100 protein linked to heart disease
